You have agreed to be a chair of a session ISCB46 - many thanks for that! In this document we summarize answers to some common questions and further instructions. 

# Technical setup and how we plan to run the sessions

- The conference will run as hybrid, i.e. with participants in the room and online.

# During the session

Your task prior and during the session are:

- Have speakers use head mics.
- Stick to the allocated timetable and end on time.
- Call out those on the phone so that they can questions as well.
- Be aware of the chat monitors and mic runners.

# FAQs

For more general questions please refer to the [FAQs](faq.html).
